column5: Does anyone know of any good spots in Ontario for catfish. I have this urge to go catfishing and for some reason its not gonna go away. If you've had any luck in Ontario let me know.Thanks ##### Whipped In Ontario
YOU ARE KIDDING ME, RIGHT????? CATFISH WHEN YOU COULD WALLEYE FISH???????? WOW!!!!
Downtown Ottawa, in the Ottawa River.Also you may catch Wally's, Smallies, Large mouth, muskie, Pike, and whatever swims.

Don't get me wrong, we walleye fish all the time. Bay of Quinte, Nipising, and sometimes Erie. I just keep reading what a blast catfish fishing is. I caught one when i was a junior angler when i was sunfish and panfish fishing and now i want to catch on purpose.
There are some terrific catfish opportunities on many Ohio rivers that feed Lake Erie. How about the north side. There must be some there.
